Note: In OS X Lion (on Mac), scrollbars are hidden by default and only shown when being used (even though "overflow:scroll" is set). More Examples Make a fancy table This example demonstrates how to create a fancy table. Set the position of the table caption This example demonstrates how to position the table caption. CSS Table Properties Property Description border Sets all the border properties in one declaration border-collapse Specifies whether or not table borders should be collapsed border-spacing Specifies the distance between the borders of adjacent cells caption-side Specifies the placement of a table caption empty-cells Specifies whether or not to display borders and background on empty cells in a table table-layout Sets the layout algorithm to be used for a table ★ +1
